main event: Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED] observed a bright object in the sky for about 3 hours on 27 August 1958.
interesting points: The object exhibited erratic movement, going side to side and disappearing and reappearing in the same location., The object was described as very bright and once seemed to move in a complete circle., At the time of the sighting, the planet Mars was beginning to appear above the northeastern horizon., Observers suggested that atmospheric conditions and industrial haze may have influenced their perception of the object., The report concluded that the observers may have actually seen the star Alpherats or the planet Mars.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
